price: «Ба Аллоҳ таоло савганд, ки мо дар гумроҳии ошкоре будем»
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
